> [anonymouslogin](#comment_49_17AMQVbBa12XB3xFWKDnP2dCEx92TaiY7X): It is okay not to be good in English. For me it is also difficult. It is not my main language.But people coming to the English ZeroTalk expect English.

For most Chinese, they just use Zeronet for fun. They will use every free tool to avoid the Internet censorship in China. Do not be surprised, they will not take care other thought from countries' people since they think they are total freedom outside the censor of China.
